Use to apply Mini Tie-Lok Ties

For applying 0. 177" wide smooth ID Mini Tie-Lok Ties for cable bundling, hose bundling and identification tagging. Forms unique patented dimple lock with a strong locking force and cuts off the excess band flush with top of buckle so the completed buckle is smooth and not sharp.

  • Forms patented dimple lock with a strong locking force of 100 pounds (45 Kg)
  • Adjustable controlled tension with repeatable results
  • Easy to use, lightweight, compact design
Specifications
Mini Tie-Lok II Tool
For applying 0. 177" wide smooth ID Mini Tie-Lok Ties for cable bundling, hose bundling and identification tagging. Forms unique patented dimple lock with a strong locking force and cuts off the excess band flush with top of buckle so the completed buckle is smooth and not sharp.
  • Forms patented dimple lock with a strong locking force of 100 pounds (45 Kg)
  • Adjustable controlled tension with repeatable results
  • Easy to use, lightweight, compact design

Use to apply Tie-Lok Ties

Applies 1/4" wide smooth ID Tie-Lok Ties used in cable bundling, hose bundling, CV boot installation and identification tagging. Locks tie with the patented Tie-Lok and cuts off excess band flush with top of buckle so the completed buckle is smooth and not sharp

  • Forms patented dimple lock with a strong locking force of 250 pounds (130 Kg)
  • Adjustable controlled tension with repeatable results
  • Easy to use, lightweight, compact design

  • Forms patented dimple lock with a strong locking force of 250 pounds (130 Kg)

Use to apply 3/8" wide Tie-Lok Stainless Steel Ties

Specifications
The new TL3800 Tie-Lock Tool. Specifically designed to install 3/8" wide Tie-Lok Stainless Steel Ties. Hardened steel construction with corrosion resistant finish. Repeatable, controlled tie tension. Punch depth limiter. Light weight, compact design. Cut off produces clean hidden edges.
Specifications
Weight: 0. 626 kg. Tension control: spring loaded ratchet drive. Tensioning force: 147. 42 kg (325 lbs) average. Lock Type: Dimple.
Use to install band types
Tie-Lok Stainless Steel Ties in 3/8" wide only
Tool Accessories
None
Tie-Lok Tool Replacement Parts

Designed for quick installation, tightest clamping force, and gap-free inside diameter to minimize leaks. The best choice for demanding applications.

  • Unique lock formed under full tension maximizing tightness.
  • Lock is thicker and 2-3 times stronger than other preformed clamps.
  • Smooth ID design reduces leak paths.
  • Lock hood protects lock from snags.
  • Double wrapped for additional strength.
  • Install Ultra-Lok preformed clamping systems quickly using portable power tools.

Use to apply BAND-IT Band

Standard BAND-IT Ratchet Tool. Heavy duty windless type tensioner for 3/8" to 3/4" stainless steel as well as carbon steel banding in thickness up to 0. 030". Highly portable, fast, reliable ratchet type tool. For sign hanging, insulation work, general applications and other banding applications.

  • Tensions and cuts off the tail of the clamp being formed
  • Used to apply BAND-IT Stainless steel bands, Galvanised carbon steel band, BAND-FAST, general use band and miscellaneous strapping
  • Designed for easy loading and removing of material
  • Tool for use with medium strength applications

Reinforced rib design provides additional strength to resist effects of stress, wind and vibration.

Reinforced rib design provides additional strength to resist effects of stress, wind and vibration.
  • 200/300 Stainless Steel
  • Industry standard for all round poles greater than 3" diameter
  • Includes a stainless bolt, nylon washer and 5/16-18 x 3/4" stainless steel hex head bolt with metal and fibre washer, no nuts required
  • 3/4" wide band slot will allow a single or a double wrap of BAND-IT band
  • Brack-it assembly can be reused
  • Used to mount traffic signs, security devices, and enclosures
  • Withstands stress and wind vibration with specialty designed reinforcement ribs
  • Fully threaded to solidly anchor attachment bolts
  • Applied with BAND-IT Band and Buckles, BAND-FAST, VALU-STRAP, VALU-STRAP Plus, or Ultra-Lok Systems.

Manufactured from Type 316 and Type 304 Stainless Steel, the Ball-Lokt Tie unique buckle design is fast becoming the globally accepted industry standard.

  • Four widths – 0. 18” (4. 6mm), 0. 31” (7. 8mm), 0. 47” (12mm), and 0. 59” (15mm) for applications ranging from identification tagging to bundling large cables
  • Self locking design allows fast installation
  • Installation by hand or with tools to assure uniform tension and clean tail cut-off for safe handling
  • Available in Type 304 and Type 316 stainless steels to provide good to excellent corrosion resistance in a wide variety of environments
  • Coated Ball-Lokt Ties are fully coated with black epoxy
  • Custom lengths can be made in 50mm increments to meet specific requirements without limits.

    Application Tools
    K50289 - Ball-Lok Tool

BAND-IT Tie-Lok ties offer a unique, patented dimple lock with a smooth ID and a low profile. This is a fast, consistent and reliable clamp. Used in many industries from automotive to cable bundling.

304 Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • When installed with the A92079 Tie-Lok II tool can withstand forces above 250 pounds
  • Forms a low profile single wrapped assembly to secure cables, hoses, I. D. Tags, CV Boots, filter bags
  • Available in 3 Widths. 4. 5mm, 6. 35mm & 9. 53mm

  • When installed with the A92079 Tie-Lok II tool can withstand forces above 250 pounds
  • Forms a low profile single wrapped assembly to secure cables, hoses, I. D. Tags, CV Boots, filter bags
  • Available in 3 Widths. 4. 5mm, 6. 35mm & 9. 53mm

The original Ear-Lokt style buckle.

BAND-IT Ear-Lokt Buckles can be used with many types of BAND-IT stainless steel banding providing superior fastening strength.

Ear-Lokt style buckle for standard duty applications including hose assemblies, cable bundling and general fastening
  • 201 Stainless Steel offers good resistance to oxidation and many moderate corrosive agents
  • Can hold a single or double wrapped band configuration
  • Band clamps can be formed over any contour or shape
  • Can be applied on BAND-IT band with the following BAND-IT tools
    		• C00169, C00369, C07569

BAND-IT Scru-Lokt Buckles can be used with all types of steel banding providing superior fastening strength and adjustablilty.

  • 301SS 1/4 hard steel, offers good resistance to oxidation and many moderate corrosive agents
  • Use whenever an adjustable, or temporary clamp is required. Can be retensioned at any time
  • Utilized in general use banding applications
  • Can hold a single or double wrapped band configuration
  • Tension band and buckle with one of the following tools, C00169, C00369, C07569, C40099, and J02069
  • Buckle is locked by tightening set scru with hex key provided in package

BAND-IT Band 201 Stainless Steel, clamping and fastening with a combination of high strength and quality appearance. Offers good resistance to oxidation and many moderate corrosive agents.

Now with EASY SCALE, a patented imprint on the band to determine band length. Eliminates costly waste and complicated measuring by allowing users to quickly and precisely roll out the length of band needed for any clamp. No more guesswork!

Our most popular clamp, the BAND-IT Jr. Smooth ID Preformed Clamp has the widest choice of sizes and materials in a leak resistant design.

  • Vibration resistant lip wrap lock design. Lock is formed by a simple lever movement. No hammering or crimping.
  • Unique buckle nest and smooth ID design reduces leak paths compared to Centre Punch Clamps.
  • Double wrapped for additional strength.
  • Various materials for different corrosive environments.

Use to apply Multi-Lok Ties

Specifications
Features
Quickly, easily and consistently applies any size Multi-Lok Ties as well as most other self-locking ties - stainless steel, nylon or plastic. Simply adjust the Multi-Lok Tool for the desired tension, slip the Multi-Lok in the slot, or side load, and squeeze the handle. When the proper tension is reached, the Multi-Lok Tool automatically cuts the tail off flush with the buckle.

Use to apply Ultra-Lok Band and Ultra-Lok Preformed Clamps

Specifications
Ideal for hose clamping. Electric Ultra-Lok Tool. Clamps 3/4" or 1/2" Ultra-Lok band and Ultra-Lok preformed clamps. Designed for consistent repeatable tensioning. Adjustable speed and torque. Clamps can be applied four times faster than conventional clamps. Forms lock under full tension. Shear plate available to convert tool from 3/4" to 1/2" Ultra-Lok clamps. Available in 220V/240V.

BAND-IT Giant Band is tough where tough counts. Giant Band produces the strongest band clamp in the industry. It is used primarily in the utility market and telecommunications. Giant Band can be formed into a single or double wrapped clamp configuration.

  • 201 Stainless Steel in a shiny finish, offers good resistance to oxidation and many moderate corrosive agents
  • Used with BAND-IT G40269 tool and G44199 Giant Buckle (below)

BAND-IT's exclusive design of the Tri-Lokt Hose Nipple is the answer for heavy duty industrial hose applications. The Tri-Lokt Nipple should be used when a positive lock is required between the clamp and the nipple. The locking yoke or tie strip assembly together with the BAND-IT clamp accommodates the various wall thicknesses of different types of hoses

  • End barb provides excellent holding strength.
  • Secure lock due to a unique yoke or tie strip assembly which is clamped to the hose.
  • Low profile.
  • Ease of installation.
Specifications
Features
  • End barb provides excellent holding strength.
  • Secure lock due to a unique yoke or tie strip assembly which is clamped to the hose.
  • Low profile.
  • Ease of installation.

Notes
  • Only Stainless Steel BAND-IT clamps should be used with Tri-Lokt Hose Nipples.
  • Hose and nipples should never be operated in excess of the maximum working pressure established by the hose manufacturer.
  • Nut end has conical seat to seal with a Tri-Lokt Male Nipple of comparible size.
  • Replacement Tri-Lokt Stainless Steel Tie Strip Kits and Yokes available. Contact BAND-IT for more information.
  • Finish may be clear zinc or dichromate zinc plating on the carbon steel nipple.

Reinforced rib design provides additional strength to resist effects of stress, wind and vibration.
  • Industry standard for pole diameters greater than 14", square poles and wooden poles larger than 8" diameter
  • 200/300 stainless steel
  • Includes a stainless bolt, nylon washer and 5/16-18 x 3/4" stainless steel hex head bolt with metal and fibre washer, no nuts required
  • 3/4" wide band slot will allow a single or a double wrap of BAND-IT band
  • Brack-it assembly can be reused
  • Fully threaded to solidly anchor attachment bolts
  • Used to mount traffic signs, security devices, and enclosures
  • Withstands stress and wind vibration with specialty designed reinforcement ribs.
  • Applied with BAND-IT Band and Buckles, BAND-FAST, VALU-STRAP, VALU-STRAP Plus, or Ultra-Lok Systems.

Reinforced rib design provides additional strength to resist effects of stress, wind and vibration.
  • Industry standard for pole diameters greater than 14", square poles and wooden poles larger than 8" diameter
  • 200/300 stainless steel
  • Includes a stainless bolt, nylon washer and 5/16-18 x 3/4" stainless steel hex head bolt with metal and fibre washer, no nuts required
  • 3/4" wide band slot will allow a single or a double wrap of BAND-IT band
  • Brack-it assembly can be reused
  • Fully threaded to solidly anchor attachment bolts
  • Used to mount traffic signs, security devices, and enclosures
  • Withstands stress and wind vibration with specialty designed reinforcement ribs.
  • Applied with BAND-IT Band and Buckles, BAND-FAST, VALU-STRAP, VALU-STRAP Plus, or Ultra-Lok Systems.

  • Unique buckle nest and smooth ID design reduces leak paths compared to Centre Punch Clamps.
  • Double wrapped for additional strength.
  • Various materials for different corrosive environments.

Our most popular clamp, the BAND-IT Jr. Smooth ID Preformed Clamp has the widest choice of sizes and materials in a leak resistant design.

Used in less demanding applications where minimizing leaks and longevity are not critical.

  • Lock with impact from a hammer using a conical punch.
  • Double wrapped using 201 Stainless Steel or galvanized carbon steel.
  • Manufactured with thicker 201 Stainless Steel buckles than competitive clamps to provide added locking strength.
  • Not recommended for use with fittings that may crack as a result of impact.

Our most popular clamp, the BAND-IT Jr. Smooth ID Preformed Clamp has the widest choice of sizes and materials in a leak resistant design.

  • Vibration resistant lip wrap lock design. Lock is formed by a simple lever movement. No hammering or crimping.
  • Unique buckle nest and smooth ID design reduces leak paths compared to Centre Punch Clamps.
  • Double wrapped for additional strength.
  • Various materials for different corrosive environments.

Our most popular clamp, the BAND-IT Jr. Smooth ID Preformed Clamp has the widest choice of sizes and materials in a leak resistant design.

  • Various materials for different corrosive environments.

BAND-IT's exclusive design of the Tri-Lokt Hose Nipple is the answer for heavy duty industrial hose applications. The Tri-Lokt Nipple should be used when a positive lock is required between the clamp and the nipple. The locking yoke or tie strip assembly together with the BAND-IT clamp accommodates the various wall thicknesses of different types of hoses.

  • End barb provides excellent holding strength.
  • Secure lock due to a unique yoke or tie strip assembly which is clamped to the hose.
  • Low profile.
  • Ease of installation.

BAND-IT's exclusive design of the Tri-Lokt Hose Nipple is the answer for heavy duty industrial hose applications. The Tri-Lokt Nipple should be used when a positive lock is required between the clamp and the nipple. The locking yoke or tie strip assembly together with the BAND-IT clamp accommodates the various wall thicknesses of different types of hoses.

  • End barb provides excellent holding strength.
  • Secure lock due to a unique yoke or tie strip assembly which is clamped to the hose.
  • Low profile.
  • Ease of installation.

Our most popular clamp, the BAND-IT Jr. Smooth ID Preformed Clamp has the widest choice of sizes and materials in a leak resistant design.

  • Unique buckle nest and smooth ID design reduces leak paths compared to Centre Punch Clamps.
  • Double wrapped for additional strength.
  • Various materials for different corrosive environments.

BAND-IT VALU-STRAP Band, VALU-STRAP Plus, and Valuband is the light duty stainless steel banding used in applications ranging from strapping to bundling. Thickness: 0. 015", 0. 020", 0. 025". May be 200 or 300 series Stainless Steel, typically non-magnetic.

200/300 Stainless Steel
  • Economical and easy to install
  • Utilized in light duty and general use banding applications
  • BAND-IT Valu-Strap offers light duty strength and can be formed to any shape and diameter
  • Used frequently for cable bundling, insulation, and hose bundling applications
  • Can be applied on BAND-IT band with the following BAND-IT tools
    		• C00169, C00369, C07569, C08569

BAND-IT's exclusive design of the Tri-Lokt Hose Nipple is the answer for heavy duty industrial hose applications. The Tri-Lokt Nipple should be used when a positive lock is required between the clamp and the nipple. The locking yoke or tie strip assembly together with the BAND-IT clamp accommodates the various wall thicknesses of different types of hoses.

  • End barb provides excellent holding strength.
  • Secure lock due to a unique yoke or tie strip assembly which is clamped to the hose.
  • Low profile.
  • Ease of installation.

BAND-IT's exclusive design of the Tri-Lokt Hose Nipple is the answer for heavy duty industrial hose applications. The Tri-Lokt Nipple should be used when a positive lock is required between the clamp and the nipple. The locking yoke or tie strip assembly together with the BAND-IT clamp accommodates the various wall thicknesses of different types of hoses.

  • End barb provides excellent holding strength.
  • Secure lock due to a unique yoke or tie strip assembly which is clamped to the hose.
  • Low profile.
  • Ease of installation.

201 Stainless Steel, coated with COLOR-IT Polyester coating. COLOR-IT Polyester coating is an exterior polyester paint coating that provides excellent abrasion and UV resistance. Products coated with COLOR-IT work with standard banding tools.

COLOR-IT Coatings are available in a variety of colours and types providing superior performance and manufactured with your specific application in mind. Whether you are colour-matching decorative light poles, identifying materials, or matching existing hardware on specific projects, COLOR-IT has the right coating for your project needs.

COLOR-IT coatings come in a wide range of colours, and offer superior performance, UV resistance and durability
  • Utilized in general use banding applications
  • Perfect for colour identification and/or matching decorative needs
  • Comes in a durable clear plastic tote for easy dispensing
  • Installs easily with the following tools
    		• the Standard Banding Tool (C00169), the Heavy Duty Banding Tool (C00369), the Bantam Tool (C07569), the Bantam Strapping Tool (C08569) and the Ratchet Tool (C40099)

BAND-IT's exclusive design of the Tri-Lokt Hose Nipple is the answer for heavy duty industrial hose applications. The Tri-Lokt Nipple should be used when a positive lock is required between the clamp and the nipple. The locking yoke or tie strip assembly together with the BAND-IT clamp accommodates the various wall thicknesses of different types of hoses.

  • End barb provides excellent holding strength.
  • Secure lock due to a unique yoke or tie strip assembly which is clamped to the hose.
  • Low profile.
  • Ease of installation.

201 Stainless Steel, coated with COLOR-IT Polyester coating. COLOR-IT Polyester coating is an exterior polyester paint coating that provides excellent abrasion and UV resistance. Products coated with COLOR-IT work with standard banding tools.

COLOR-IT Coatings are available in a variety of colours and types providing superior performance and manufactured with your specific application in mind. Whether you are colour-matching decorative light poles, identifying materials, or matching existing hardware on specific projects, COLOR-IT has the right coating for your project needs.

COLOR-IT coatings come in a wide range of colours, and offer superior performance, UV resistance and durability
  • Utilized in general use banding applications
  • Perfect for colour identification and/or matching decorative needs
  • Comes in a durable clear plastic tote for easy dispensing
  • Installs easily with the following tools
    		• the Standard Banding Tool (C00169), the Heavy Duty Banding Tool (C00369), the Bantam Tool (C07569), the Bantam Strapping Tool (C08569) and the Ratchet Tool (C40099)

Our most popular clamp, the BAND-IT Jr. Smooth ID Preformed Clamp has the widest choice of sizes and materials in a leak resistant design.

  • Double wrapped for additional strength.
  • Various materials for different corrosive environments.

BAND-IT VALU-STRAP Band, VALU-STRAP Plus, and Valuband is the light duty stainless steel banding used in applications ranging from strapping to bundling. Thickness: 0. 015", 0. 020", 0. 025". May be 200 or 300 series Stainless Steel, typically non-magnetic.

200/300 Stainless Steel
  • Economical and easy to install
  • Utilized in light duty and general use banding applications
  • BAND-IT Valu-Strap offers light duty strength and can be formed to any shape and diameter
  • Used frequently for cable bundling, insulation, and hose bundling applications
  • Can be applied on BAND-IT band with the following BAND-IT tools
    		• C00169, C00369, C07569, C08569

Our most popular clamp, the BAND-IT Jr. Smooth ID Preformed Clamp has the widest choice of sizes and materials in a leak resistant design.

BAND-IT VALU-STRAP Band, VALU-STRAP Plus, and Valuband is the light duty stainless steel banding used in applications ranging from strapping to bundling. Thickness: 0. 015", 0. 020", 0. 025". May be 200 or 300 series Stainless Steel, typically non-magnetic.

200/300 Stainless Steel
  • Economical and easy to install
  • Utilized in light duty and general use banding applications

BAND-IT's exclusive design of the Tri-Lokt Hose Nipple is the answer for heavy duty industrial hose applications. The Tri-Lokt Nipple should be used when a positive lock is required between the clamp and the nipple. The locking yoke or tie strip assembly together with the BAND-IT clamp accommodates the various wall thicknesses of different types of hoses.

  • End barb provides excellent holding strength.
  • Secure lock due to a unique yoke or tie strip assembly which is clamped to the hose.
  • Low profile.
  • Ease of installation.

200/300 Stainless Steel

BAND-IT's exclusive design of the Tri-Lokt Hose Nipple is the answer for heavy duty industrial hose applications. The Tri-Lokt Nipple should be used when a positive lock is required between the clamp and the nipple. The locking yoke or tie strip assembly together with the BAND-IT clamp accommodates the various wall thicknesses of different types of hoses.

  • End barb provides excellent holding strength.
  • Secure lock due to a unique yoke or tie strip assembly which is clamped to the hose.
  • Low profile.
  • Ease of installation.

BAND-IT's exclusive design of the Tri-Lokt Hose Nipple is the answer for heavy duty industrial hose applications. The Tri-Lokt Nipple should be used when a positive lock is required between the clamp and the nipple. The locking yoke or tie strip assembly together with the BAND-IT clamp accommodates the various wall thicknesses of different types of hoses.

  • End barb provides excellent holding strength.
  • Secure lock due to a unique yoke or tie strip assembly which is clamped to the hose.
  • Low profile.
  • Ease of installation.

Our most popular clamp, the BAND-IT Jr. Smooth ID Preformed Clamp has the widest choice of sizes and materials in a leak resistant design.

  • Install Ultra-Lok preformed clamping systems quickly using portable power tools.

BAND-IT VALU-STRAP Band, VALU-STRAP Plus, and Valuband is the light duty stainless steel banding used in applications ranging from strapping to bundling. Thickness: 0. 015", 0. 020", 0. 025". May be 200 or 300 series Stainless Steel, typically non-magnetic.

200/300 Stainless Steel
  • Economical and easy to install
  • Utilized in light duty and general use banding applications
  • BAND-IT Valu-Strap offers light duty strength and can be formed to any shape and diameter
  • Used frequently for cable bundling, insulation, and hose bundling applications
  • Can be applied on BAND-IT band with the following BAND-IT tools
    		• C00169, C00369, C07569, C08569

201 Stainless Steel, coated with COLOR-IT Polyester coating. COLOR-IT Polyester coating is an exterior polyester paint coating that provides excellent abrasion and UV resistance. Products coated with COLOR-IT work with standard banding tools.

COLOR-IT Coatings are available in a variety of colours and types providing superior performance and manufactured with your specific application in mind. Whether you are colour-matching decorative light poles, identifying materials, or matching existing hardware on specific projects, COLOR-IT has the right coating for your project needs.

COLOR-IT coatings come in a wide range of colours, and offer superior performance, UV resistance and durability
  • Utilized in general use banding applications
  • Perfect for colour identification and/or matching decorative needs
  • Comes in a durable clear plastic tote for easy dispensing
  • Installs easily with the following tools
    		• the Standard Banding Tool (C00169), the Heavy Duty Banding Tool (C00369), the Bantam Tool (C07569), the Bantam Strapping Tool (C08569) and the Ratchet Tool (C40099)

BAND-IT's exclusive design of the Tri-Lokt Hose Nipple is the answer for heavy duty industrial hose applications. The Tri-Lokt Nipple should be used when a positive lock is required between the clamp and the nipple. The locking yoke or tie strip assembly together with the BAND-IT clamp accommodates the various wall thicknesses of different types of hoses.

  • End barb provides excellent holding strength.
  • Secure lock due to a unique yoke or tie strip assembly which is clamped to the hose.
  • Low profile.
  • Ease of installation.

BAND-IT VALU-STRAP Band, VALU-STRAP Plus, and Valuband is the light duty stainless steel banding used in applications ranging from strapping to bundling. Thickness: 0. 015", 0. 020", 0. 025". May be 200 or 300 series Stainless Steel, typically non-magnetic.

200/300 Stainless Steel
  • Economical and easy to install
  • Utilized in light duty and general use banding applications
  • BAND-IT Valu-Strap offers light duty strength and can be formed to any shape and diameter
  • Used frequently for cable bundling, insulation, and hose bundling applications
  • Can be applied on BAND-IT band with the following BAND-IT tools
    		• C00169, C00369, C07569, C08569

201 Stainless Steel, coated with COLOR-IT Polyester coating. COLOR-IT Polyester coating is an exterior polyester paint coating that provides excellent abrasion and UV resistance. Products coated with COLOR-IT work with standard banding tools.

COLOR-IT Coatings are available in a variety of colours and types providing superior performance and manufactured with your specific application in mind. Whether you are colour-matching decorative light poles, identifying materials, or matching existing hardware on specific projects, COLOR-IT has the right coating for your project needs.

COLOR-IT coatings come in a wide range of colours, and offer superior performance, UV resistance and durability
  • Utilized in general use banding applications
  • Perfect for colour identification and/or matching decorative needs
  • Comes in a durable clear plastic tote for easy dispensing
  • Installs easily with the following tools
    		• the Standard Banding Tool (C00169), the Heavy Duty Banding Tool (C00369), the Bantam Tool (C07569), the Bantam Strapping Tool (C08569) and the Ratchet Tool (C40099)

201 Stainless Steel, coated with COLOR-IT Polyester coating. COLOR-IT Polyester coating is an exterior polyester paint coating that provides excellent abrasion and UV resistance. Products coated with COLOR-IT work with standard banding tools.

COLOR-IT Coatings are available in a variety of colours and types providing superior performance and manufactured with your specific application in mind. BAND-IT's exclusive design of the Tri-Lokt Hose Nipple is the answer for heavy duty industrial hose applications. The Tri-Lokt Nipple should be used when a positive lock is required between the clamp and the nipple. The locking yoke or tie strip assembly together with the BAND-IT clamp accommodates the various wall thicknesses of different types of hoses.

  • End barb provides excellent holding strength.
  • Secure lock due to a unique yoke or tie strip assembly which is clamped to the hose.
  • Low profile.
  • Ease of installation.

BAND-IT's exclusive design of the Tri-Lokt Hose Nipple is the answer for heavy duty industrial hose applications. The Tri-Lokt Nipple should be used when a positive lock is required between the clamp and the nipple. The locking yoke or tie strip assembly together with the BAND-IT clamp accommodates the various wall thicknesses of different types of hoses.

  • End barb provides excellent holding strength.
  • Secure lock due to a unique yoke or tie strip assembly which is clamped to the hose.
  • Low profile.
  • Ease of installation.

200/300 Stainless Steel
  • Economical and easy to install

BAND-IT Giant Band is tough where tough counts. Giant Band produces the strongest band clamp in the industry. It is used primarily in the utility market and telecommunications. Giant Band can be formed into a single or double wrapped clamp configuration.

  • Used with BAND-IT G40269 tool and G44199 Giant Buckle (below)

The widest and thickest band provides maximum strength. Available in 201 SS bright or matte finish.

BAND-IT Giant Band is tough where tough counts. Giant Band produces the strongest band clamp in the industry. It is used primarily in the utility market and telecommunications. Giant Band can be formed into a single or double wrapped clamp configuration.

  • The thickest BAND-IT band
  • 201 Stainless Steel in a shiny finish, offers good resistance to oxidation and many moderate corrosive agents
  • Used with BAND-IT G40269 tool and G44199 Giant Buckle (below)

BAND-IT Tie-Lok ties offer a unique, patented dimple lock with a smooth ID and a low profile. This is a fast, consistent and reliable clamp. Used in many industries from automotive to cable bundling.

304 Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • When installed with the A92079 Tie-Lok II tool can withstand forces above 250 pounds
  • Forms a low profile single wrapped assembly to secure cables, hoses, I. D. Tags, CV Boots, filter bags
  • Available in 3 Widths. 4. 5mm, 6. 35mm & 9. 53mm

BAND-IT Tie-Lok ties offer a unique, patented dimple lock with a smooth ID and a low profile. This is a fast, consistent and reliable clamp. Used in many industries from automotive to cable bundling.

304 Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • When installed with the A92079 Tie-Lok II tool can withstand forces above 250 pounds
  • Forms a low profile single wrapped assembly to secure cables, hoses, I. D. Tags, CV Boots, filter bags
  • Available in 3 Widths. 4. 5mm, 6. 35mm & 9. 53mm

BAND-IT Tie-Lok ties offer a unique, patented dimple lock with a smooth ID and a low profile. This is a fast, consistent and reliable clamp. Used in many industries from automotive to cable bundling.

304 Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • When installed with the A92079 Tie-Lok II tool can withstand forces above 250 pounds
  • Forms a low profile single wrapped assembly to secure cables, hoses, I. D. Tags, CV Boots, filter bags
  • Available in 3 Widths. 4. 5mm, 6. 35mm & 9. 53mm

BAND-IT Tie-Lok ties offer a unique, patented dimple lock with a smooth ID and a low profile. This is a fast, consistent and reliable clamp. Used in many industries from automotive to cable bundling.

304 Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • When installed with the A92079 Tie-Lok II tool can withstand forces above 250 pounds
  • Forms a low profile single wrapped assembly to secure cables, hoses, I. D. Tags, CV Boots, filter bags
  • Available in 3 Widths. 4. 5mm, 6. 35mm & 9. 53mm

BAND-IT Scru-Seal Kit uses a rack and pinion system allowing the user to make a clamp in any size. Kit offers complete flexibility for use in almost any application. Form clamps of any diameter from continuous roll of band and tension using only a screwdriver.

  • A rack and pinion system used with band to create any size clamp
  • Components separately packaged rack and housing and band for flexibility
  • Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • An adjustable worm drive, screwdriver clamp can be made with any band cutter and a screw driver
  • Can be retensioned at any time

BAND-IT Tie-Lok ties offer a unique, patented dimple lock with a smooth ID and a low profile. This is a fast, consistent and reliable clamp. Used in many industries from automotive to cable bundling.

304 Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • When installed with the A92079 Tie-Lok II tool can withstand forces above 250 pounds
  • Forms a low profile single wrapped assembly to secure cables, hoses, I. D. Tags, CV Boots, filter bags
  • Available in 3 Widths. 4. 5mm, 6. 35mm & 9. 53mm

BAND-IT Scru-Seal Kit uses a rack and pinion system allowing the user to make a clamp in any size. Kit offers complete flexibility for use in almost any application. Form clamps of any diameter from continuous roll of band and tension using only a screwdriver.

  • A rack and pinion system used with band to create any size clamp
  • Components separately packaged rack and housing and band for flexibility
  • Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • An adjustable worm drive, screwdriver clamp can be made with any band cutter and a screw driver
  • Can be retensioned at any time

BAND-IT Tie-Lok ties offer a unique, patented dimple lock with a smooth ID and a low profile. This is a fast, consistent and reliable clamp. Used in many industries from automotive to cable bundling.

304 Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • When installed with the A92079 Tie-Lok II tool can withstand forces above 250 pounds
  • Forms a low profile single wrapped assembly to secure cables, hoses, I. D. Tags, CV Boots, filter bags
  • Available in 3 Widths. 4. 5mm, 6. 35mm & 9. 53mm

BAND-IT Scru-Seal Kit uses a rack and pinion system allowing the user to make a clamp in any size. Kit offers complete flexibility for use in almost any application. Form clamps of any diameter from continuous roll of band and tension using only a screwdriver.

  • A rack and pinion system used with band to create any size clamp
  • Components separately packaged rack and housing and band for flexibility
  • Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • An adjustable worm drive, screwdriver clamp can be made with any band cutter and a screw driver
  • Can be retensioned at any time

BAND-IT Tie-Lok ties offer a unique, patented dimple lock with a smooth ID and a low profile. This is a fast, consistent and reliable clamp. Used in many industries from automotive to cable bundling.

304 Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • When installed with the A92079 Tie-Lok II tool can withstand forces above 250 pounds
  • Forms a low profile single wrapped assembly to secure cables, hoses, I. D. Tags, CV Boots, filter bags
  • Available in 3 Widths. 4. 5mm, 6. 35mm & 9. 53mm

BAND-IT Scru-Seal Kit uses a rack and pinion system allowing the user to make a clamp in any size. Kit offers complete flexibility for use in almost any application. Form clamps of any diameter from continuous roll of band and tension using only a screwdriver.

  • A rack and pinion system used with band to create any size clamp
  • Components separately packaged rack and housing and band for flexibility
  • Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • An adjustable worm drive, screwdriver clamp can be made with any band cutter and a screw driver
  • Can be retensioned at any time

BAND-IT Tie-Lok ties offer a unique, patented dimple lock with a smooth ID and a low profile. This is a fast, consistent and reliable clamp. Used in many industries from automotive to cable bundling.

304 Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • When installed with the A92079 Tie-Lok II tool can withstand forces above 250 pounds
  • Forms a low profile single wrapped assembly to secure cables, hoses, I. D. Tags, CV Boots, filter bags
  • Available in 3 Widths. 4. 5mm, 6. 35mm & 9. 53mm

BAND-IT Tie-Lok ties offer a unique, patented dimple lock with a smooth ID and a low profile. This is a fast, consistent and reliable clamp. Used in many industries from automotive to cable bundling.

304 Stainless steel offers very good resistance to mild atmosphere, fresh water and the sun's UV rays
  • When installed with the A92079 Tie-Lok II tool can withstand forces above 250 pounds
  • Forms a low profile single wrapped assembly to secure cables, hoses, I. D. Tags, CV Boots, filter bags
  • Available in 3 Widths. 4. 5mm, 6. 35mm & 9. 53mm

Utilized mainly for low cost. Minimal corrosion resistance.

BAND-IT galvanized carbon steel banding and buckles is used mainly in lower cost applications where corrosion resistance is not a factor.

  • Galvanized carbon steel band offers medium strength coupled with good corrosion resistance in mild atmosphere and occasional fresh water
  • Used with Ear-Lokt Style Buckle for medium duty applications
  • Can formed as single or double wrapped band configuration
  • Utilized in general use banding applications

BAND-IT Scru-Lokt Buckles can be used with all types of steel banding providing superior fastening strength and adjustablilty.

  • 301SS 1/4 hard steel, offers good resistance to oxidation and many moderate corrosive agents
  • Use whenever an adjustable, or temporary clamp is required. Can be retensioned at any time
  • Utilized in general use banding applications
  • Can hold a single or double wrapped band configuration
  • Tension band and buckle with one of the following tools, C00169, C00369, C07569, C40099, and J02069
  • Buckle is locked by tightening set scru with hex key provided in package

BAND-IT Band 201 Stainless Steel, clamping and fastening with a combination of high strength and quality appearance. Offers good resistance to oxidation and many moderate corrosive agents.

Now with EASY SCALE, a patented imprint on the band to determine band length. Eliminates costly waste and complicated measuring by allowing users to quickly and precisely roll out the length of band needed for any clamp. No more guesswork!

201 Stainless Steel offers good resistance to oxidation and many moderate corrosive agents
  • Utilized in general use banding applications

BAND-IT Band 201 Stainless Steel, clamping and fastening with a combination of high strength and quality appearance. Offers good resistance to oxidation and many moderate corrosive agents.

Now with EASY SCALE, a patented imprint on the band to determine band length. Eliminates costly waste and complicated measuring by allowing users to quickly and precisely roll out the length of band needed for any clamp. No more guesswork!

201 Stainless Steel offers good resistance to oxidation and many moderate corrosive agents
  • Utilized in general use banding applications
  • Can be used with clip style buckles to create band clamps
  • Packaged in a standard box or a durable plastic tote for easy dispensing
  • Installs easily with the following tools
    		• the Standard Banding Tool (C00189), the Heavy Duty Banding Tool (C00369), the Bantam Tool (C07569), the Bantam Strapping Tool (C08569), the Ratchet Tool (C40099), and Pok-IT II Tool (J02069)

Use to apply Tie-Lok Ties

Applies 1/4" wide smooth ID Tie-Lok Ties used in cable bundling, hose bundling, CV boot installation and identification tagging. Locks tie with the patented Tie-Lok and cuts off excess band flush with top of buckle so the completed buckle is smooth and not sharp

  • Forms patented dimple lock with a strong locking force of 250 pounds (130 Kg)
  • Adjustable controlled tension with repeatable results
  • Easy to use, lightweight, compact design
Specifications
Applies 1/4" wide smooth ID Tie-Lok Ties used in cable bundling, hose bundling, CV boot installation and identification tagging. Locks tie with the patented Tie-Lok and cuts off excess band flush with top of buckle so the completed buckle is smooth and not sharp
  • Forms patented dimple lock with a strong locking force of 250 pounds (130 Kg)
  • Adjustable controlled tension with repeatable results
  • Easy to use, lightweight, compact design

The original Ear-Lokt style buckle.

BAND-IT Ear-Lokt Buckles can be used with many types of BAND-IT stainless steel banding providing superior fastening strength.

Ear-Lokt style buckle for standard duty applications including hose assemblies, cable bundling and general fastening
  • 201 Stainless Steel offers good resistance to oxidation and many moderate corrosive agents
  • Can hold a single or double wrapped band configuration
  • Band clamps can be formed over any contour or shape
  • Can be applied on BAND-IT band with the following BAND-IT tools
    		• C00169, C00369, C07569
